creator: Harris & Ewing
medium: 1 negative : glass ; 4 x 5 in. or smaller
title: President and Congressional leaders get-together. Washington, D.C., Jan. 9. President Roosevelt today revived his Monday morning White House conferences with the 'big four' of Congress and read to them the special message he is writing on national defense to be sent to Congress probably tomorrow. Leaving the White House are, left to right. Vice President Garner, Senate majority Leader Barkley, speaker Bankhead and House Majority Leader Rayburn, 1/9/39
